concept.title: Documentation History
concept.shortdesc: This section contains information about changes to the documentation in this release. Included in this section are notes about the overall documentation structure as well as individual sections.

ul.li: We now include all guides in a single table of contents. You can still download individual guides as PDFs.
We created a new Hybrid section. For more information, see .
We created a new Security section. For more informaiton, see .
